body:
Comment 6: 
If the go tool from a gc build works fine, then all is well.  The gccgo build does not
currently build the go tool at all.  It will at some point, and at that point it will
need to work.  I would be happy to accept patches to build it, but I don't care if it
doesn't work when you use some hand-crafted procedure to build it.
_Status changed to **WontFix**._
